tool_description: Applies demographic filters to census data based on age, race, ethnicity, income, education, and other characteristics.

race_categories.description: Race categories to include: white, black, asian, native_american, pacific_islander, other, two_or_more

ethnicity.description: Ethnicity filter: hispanic, non_hispanic, or all

education_levels.description: Education levels: less_than_hs, high_school, some_college, bachelors, graduate

gender.description: Gender filter: male, female, or all

housing_type.description: Housing type: owner_occupied, renter_occupied, or all

employment_status.description: Employment status: employed, unemployed, not_in_labor_force, or all

error_messages: Invalid age range: age_range_min must be less than age_range_max and both must be between 0-120
Invalid race categories: Use valid race category names from the predefined list
Invalid income range: income_range_min must be less than income_range_max and both must be non-negative
Invalid education levels: Use valid education level names from the predefined list
Invalid filter values: gender, ethnicity, housing_type, and employment_status must use predefined options
No matching data: The combination of filters results in no matching demographic records
usage: Specify demographic criteria using the available parameters. All filters are optional and will be applied as logical AND conditions. Use 'all' or leave parameters unset to avoid filtering on that dimension.

filtered_population.description: Total population count after applying filters

geographic_breakdown.description: Population counts by geographic area after filtering

percentage_of_total.description: Filtered population as percentage of total population
